com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.annotations.core

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.core.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScreenCreatorTest.FakeController, ScreenFinderTest.BaseFakeController, ScreenTest.FakeController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    A base core.Controller class for MVC.

    • Method Detail

      • onInit

        protected abstract void onInit(Navigator nav)
        This should be used for initialization logic. This includes binding event listeners, and loading in data.
        Parameters:
        nav - the navigator (allow controller to change to a different Screen)

      • onCleanup

        protected abstract void onCleanup()
        This should be used to clean up after your controller is done with (navigated to a new Screen).

      • getView

        public View getView()
        Get the view for runner.GUI to render it.
        Returns:
        the controllers view
        See Also:
        GUI

      • init

        public void init(Navigator nav)
        An internal delegate for the onInit method.
        Parameters:
        nav - the navigator to be passed to the controller

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        An internal delegate for the onClose method.
